If you're in immediate danger or need urgent help, please contact emergency services or a 24/7 support line:
📞 Samaritans: 116 123 (free)
📞 Pieta House: 1800 247 247
You're not alone — help is always available. 💛

It sounds like you're feeling anxious. Try this:
🧘‍♀️ 4-7-8 Breathing: Inhale for 4s, hold for 7s, exhale for 8s.
📝 Write your feelings in a journal.
🌿 Step outside or take a walk if possible.
Would you like more mindfulness tips or info on counselling?

To talk to a counselor at your university:
💬 Visit the [Student Counselling Service](https://tus.ie/counselling/) or email studentcounselling@tus.ie
They offer one-on-one support, workshops, and mindfulness sessions.

Here’s a simple mindfulness tip:
🌸 Close your eyes and do 5-4-3-2-1 grounding: 5 things you can see, 4 touch, 3 hear, 2 smell, 1 taste.
It gently centers your mind.

Feeling stressed or burned out? Try:
🧘 Deep breathing for 5 minutes
📅 Short walks, tech-free time, and 7–8 hours sleep
💬 Talk to someone — even texting a friend helps.
Want tips for study-life balance?
